alert.note: Alert for Lavaca (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 3:35PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lavaca County through 430 PM CDT... At 334 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Sublime, or 16 miles east of Hallettsville, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vienna. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
